lead_paragraph: The government said it would cease military operations only after the Houthi rebels had complied with cease-fire terms that include disarming and withdrawing from strategic positions.
snippet: The government said it would cease military operations only after the Houthi rebels had complied with cease-fire terms that include disarming and withdrawing from strategic positions.

headline.main: Yemen Seems to Reject Cease-Fire With Rebels
headline.print_headline: Yemen Seems to Reject Cease-Fire With Rebels
